settings.title: AI Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your AI therapist's behavior and response style.
settings.modelFast: Optimized for quick responses and general conversation
settings.modelAnalytical: Best for complex therapeutic analysis and deep insights

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.desc: The page you are looking for does not exist.

setup.title: Set Up Two-Factor Authentication
setup.subtitle: Secure your AI Therapist with TOTP authentication

step1.title: Step 1: Scan QR Code
step1.desc: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
step1.cantScan: Can't scan? Enter this key manually:

step2.title: Step 2: Save Backup Codes
step2.desc: Store these codes safely. You can use them to access your account if you lose your device.

setup.confirmSaved: I have safely stored these backup codes

step3.title: Step 3: Verify Setup
step3.desc: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete setup

failed.title: Setup Failed
failed.desc: Unable to generate setup data. Please try again.

input.help: Type your message and press Enter to send.
input.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

main.sessionSubtitle: Safe space for healing and growth
main.newSubtitle: Start typing to begin your session
main.cbtOpen: Open CBT diary for structured reflection

empty.tagline: A safe space for healing and growth
empty.intro: This is a safe, judgment-free environment where you can explore your thoughts and feelings with compassionate AI support. Take your time, breathe deeply, and know that you're in a space designed for healing and growth.
empty.compassionDesc: Receive empathetic, non-judgmental guidance tailored to your needs
empty.privateDesc: Your conversations are confidential and stored securely

quote.new: In stillness, we plant the seeds of intention
quote.waxing_crescent: Small steps forward bring gentle growth
quote.full: You are whole, radiant, and enough
quote.waning_gibbous: Release with gratitude what no longer serves

toast.messageNotSavedBody: We couldn't save your message. Please check your connection and try again.
toast.messageNotSentBody: We couldn't reach the assistant. Please try again.
toast.issueReportedBody: Thanks for letting us know‚Äîour team will take a look.
toast.issueReportFailedBody: We couldn't send the error report. Please try again later.
toast.sendFailedBody: Could not send your message. Please try again.
toast.deleteSessionFailedBody: Could not delete the session. Please try again.
toast.memoryDeleteSuccessBody: Your therapeutic memory has been updated.
toast.memoryDeleteFailedBody: We couldn't remove the selected memory. Please try again.
toast.hideTrackerSuccessBody: You can create a new tracker from the sidebar when needed.
toast.saveFailedBody: Could not add your data to the chat. Please try again.
toast.trackerCreateSuccessBody: You can begin logging obsessions and compulsions now.
toast.localModelUnavailableBody: Could not connect to Ollama. Please ensure the daemon is running and the model is installed.
toast.connectionErrorBody: Failed to connect to Ollama server. Please check your local setup.
toast.draftDeletedBody: Your previous CBT draft has been removed.
toast.noCbtSessionBody: Please start and complete some CBT steps first.
toast.cbtSentBody: Your CBT session and therapeutic analysis have been added to your chat!
toast.cbtSendFailedBody: There was an error analyzing and sending your session. Please try again.

reports.title: Session Reports
reports.subtitle: Review insights and progress from your therapeutic sessions

comingSoon.title: Reports Coming Soon
comingSoon.desc: Complete a therapy session first to generate your personalized insights and progress reports.

example.title: Example Session Report
example.section2i2: Tendency to prioritize others' needs over own wellbeing
example.section3i2: Set specific work boundaries this week

welcome.title: Welcome to CBT Session
welcome.subtitle: A guided journey to understand your thoughts, feelings, and behaviors through proven CBT techniques.
welcome.evidenceDesc: Using proven CBT techniques for lasting change

draft.choice: Choose to continue where you left off or start fresh.
draft.found: We found an in-progress CBT session.

actionPlan.title: Future Action Plan
actionPlan.subtitle: Plan your responses for similar situations
actionPlan.headerDesc: Plan your future responses and reflect on progress
actionPlan.originalThoughtCredibility: How much do you believe your original automatic thoughts now?
actionPlan.futureActionLabel: What will you do differently next time this situation arises?
actionPlan.futureActionPlaceholder: Describe new behaviors or responses you want to try. Be specific about what you'll do, say, or think differently...
actionPlan.successMessage: üéâ Great work completing this CBT reflection! You've made important insights.
actionPlan.improvedState: Your emotional state has improved through this process

finalEmotions.title: How do you feel after this reflection?
finalEmotions.subtitle: Rate your current emotional state

thoughts.title: What thoughts went through your mind?
thoughts.subtitle: Record the automatic thoughts that came up during this situation
thoughts.help: Try to capture the exact words that went through your mind during this situation.
thoughts.placeholder: What thoughts immediately came to mind? What was I telling myself?
thoughts.credibility: How much do you believe this thought? (Credibility)

situation.title: Describe the Situation
situation.subtitle: Tell me about what happened
situation.helper: Start by describing the situation that led to your current feelings. Be as specific as you can.
prompts: A conflict with someone important to me
Feeling overwhelmed at work or school
Social anxiety in a group setting

rational.title: Rational Alternative Thoughts
rational.subtitle: Create balanced, helpful thoughts
rational.help: Replace negative thoughts with more balanced, realistic alternatives.
rational.placeholder: What's a more balanced, realistic way to think about this?
rational.confidence: How confident do you feel in this alternative thought?
prompts: Maybe I'm being too hard on myself
Nobody is perfect, and that's okay
I can learn and grow from this experience
I have people who care about me

coreBelief.title: Core Belief Exploration
coreBelief.subtitle: What deeper belief might be behind these thoughts?
coreBelief.help: Identify the underlying belief that drives your automatic thoughts.
coreBelief.placeholder: What core belief about yourself, others, or the world might be driving these thoughts?
coreBelief.credibility: How much do you believe this core belief right now?

challenge.title: Challenge Your Thoughts
challenge.subtitle: Question your beliefs with curiosity
challenge.help: Challenge your thoughts by answering these questions with an open mind.
challenge.placeholder: Take your time to really think about this...

defaultQuestions.evidence: What evidence supports this belief? What evidence contradicts it?
defaultQuestions.friend: What would I say to a friend who had this belief?
defaultQuestions.helping: Is this thought helping me or hurting me?
defaultQuestions.letGo: What would happen if I let go of this belief?
defaultQuestions.impact: How has this belief affected my life positively and negatively?
defaultQuestions.truth: Is this belief 100% true, or could there be exceptions?
defaultQuestions.perspectives: What alternative perspectives could I consider?
defaultQuestions.support: How might someone who cares about me challenge this belief?

situation.label: Situation
situation.title: Describe the Situation
situation.subtitle: Capture the triggering event and context.

emotions.label: Emotions
emotions.title: Rate Your Emotions
emotions.subtitle: Notice emotional intensity before processing your thoughts.

thoughts.label: Thoughts
thoughts.title: Capture Automatic Thoughts
thoughts.subtitle: Record the thoughts that appeared during the situation.

coreBelief.label: Core Belief
coreBelief.title: Name the Core Belief
coreBelief.subtitle: Explore the deeper belief that fuels your automatic thoughts.

challenge.label: Challenge
challenge.title: Challenge the Thought
challenge.subtitle: Use guided questions to test the accuracy of your belief.

rational.label: Rational
rational.title: Create Balanced Responses
rational.subtitle: Write compassionate, realistic statements to counter your belief.

schema.label: Schema
schema.title: Identify Schema Modes
schema.subtitle: Notice which coping modes are present and how intense they feel.

actions.label: Actions
actions.title: Plan Helpful Actions
actions.subtitle: Capture new behaviours and confidence in your revised belief.

finalEmotions.label: Final Emotions
finalEmotions.title: Reflect on Current Emotions
finalEmotions.subtitle: Compare how you feel now with how you felt at the start.

emotions.title: How are you feeling?
emotions.subtitle: Rate the emotions you're experiencing
emotions.subtitleNow: Rate how your emotions have changed
emotions.help: Click on emotions to select them, then adjust the intensity using the sliders (1-10 scale).

schema.title: Schema Modes Exploration
schema.subtitle: Which parts of yourself are most active in this situation?
schema.desc: are different emotional states or ‚Äúparts‚Äù of ourselves that become active in different situations. Select the modes that feel most present for you right now, and adjust their intensity.

summary.title: CBT Session Summary - {date}
summary.completionNote: This CBT session was completed on {date} and included comprehensive work on situation analysis, emotion tracking, thought examination, core belief exploration, rational thought development, and action planning.

footer.analyzing: Analyzing your CBT session and preparing for chat...
footer.completeStep: Complete the {step} exercise above to continue your CBT journey
footer.reflectAndSend: Reflect on your emotions, then click "Send to Chat" for AI analysis
footer.autoSaved: Your progress is automatically saved in each step ‚Äî no additional input needed
footer.start: Start your CBT session to begin therapeutic exploration

ai.situationNext:
Thank you for sharing that situation with me. Understanding the context is so important for CBT work.

Now let's explore how this situation made you feel emotionally.
ai.emotionsNext: These feelings are valid. Now let's examine what thoughts were running through your mind.
ai.thoughtsNext: Great work exploring your thoughts. Let's consider the core beliefs underneath.
ai.coreBeliefNext: Excellent insight. Now let's challenge this belief together.
ai.challengeNext: Great work challenging those thoughts. Let's develop some rational alternatives.
ai.rationalNext: Beautiful work developing balanced thoughts. Let's explore schema modes next.
ai.schemaNext: Thanks for identifying schema modes. Let's create an action plan.
ai.actionsNext: Great plan. As a final step, please reflect on how you feel now.
ai.finalNext: Wonderful reflection. You've completed your CBT session.

obsessions.title: Obsessions & Compulsions
obsessions.subtitle: Track your obsessions and compulsions to better understand patterns
obsessions.tableSubtitle: Record your obsessions and the compulsions they trigger
obsessions.step1Subtitle: What obsessive thought are you experiencing?
obsessions.step2Subtitle: What compulsive behavior does this trigger?
obsessions.frequencyHelp: How often do you perform this compulsion?
obsessions.durationHelp: How long does this compulsion typically last?
obsessions.reliefHelp: How much relief does this compulsion provide?

validation.durationMin: Duration must be at least 1 minute

emptyState.title: No obsessions or compulsions recorded yet
emptyState.subtitle: Start by adding your first obsession or compulsion to begin tracking patterns
